alert.note: Alert for Greene (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 5:48PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Greene County through 615 PM CDT... At 547 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near O`Kean, or 8 miles east of Walnut Ridge, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paragould, Marmaduke, Crowleys Ridge State Park, Oak Grove Heights, Lafe, O`Kean, Delaplaine, Fontaine, Evening Star, Walcott, Beech Grove, Stonewall, Cotton Belt, Bard, Case, Stanford, Gainesville, Halliday, Light and Walnut Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
